control_attributes.control_description: The organization marks [Assignment: organization-defined information system output devices] indicating the appropriate security marking of the information permitted to be output from the device.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization employs automated mechanisms to facilitate the maintenance and review of visitor access records.
